long_description: Secure a canoe, kayak or other large load to the top of your vehicle with the simple and effective Riverside Ratch Pack. Ratcheting system lets you easily set the necessary tension. Steel hooks attach to your vehicle and to the ends of your boat. Includes extra attachment straps for use with canoes and kayaks that don't have useable end toggles.
short_description: Secure a canoe, kayak or other large load to the top of your vehicle with the simple and effective Riverside Ratch Pack.
